name: gestor-tareas-completo
description: Sistema integral de gestiÃ³n de tareas con backend Express.js y frontend Astro

scripts.dev: npm run install:mobile && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:web: cd web-notes && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web

author: Jaime Rodriguez
